mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article (articleno, boardcd, title, content, email, hit, regdate) VALUES (seq_article_no.nextval, #{boardCd}, #{title}, #{content}, #{email}, 0, sysdate)
INSERT INTO attachfile (attachfileno, filename, filetype, filesize, articleno) VALUES (seq_attachfile.nextval, #{filename}, #{filetype}, #{filesize}, #{articleNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET hit=hit+1 WHERE articleno=#{articleNo}
mapper.select: SELECT attachfileno, filename, filetype, filesize,articleno FROM attachfile WHERE articleno = #{articleNo} ORDER BY attachfileno
SELECT boardNm FROM board WHERE boardcd = #{boardCd}
SELECT boardcd,boardnm FROM board ORDER BY boardnm
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (commentno, articleno, email, memo, regdate) VALUES (seq_comments.nextval, #{articleNo}, #{email}, #{memo}, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE comments SET memo = #{memo} WHERE commentno = #{commentNo}
mapper.select: SELECT commentno, articleno, email, memo, regdate FROM comments WHERE articleno = #{articleNo} ORDER BY commentno DESC
